summary: New textures for Konahrik & the wooden mask
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue]This mod will modify the look of Konahrik\'s mask and the wooden mask[/color]

[u]What are the changes?[/u]
- the pictures files are now 1024x1024 px  instead of 256x256 px, so the quality was improved.
- The wooden mask will be more natural and realistic. It was sculpted in the bark of a magick tree
- Konahrik will be a daedric articfact, made with a strange horned skull with a daedric jaw.


[color=grey][u]How do I instal this?[/u]
-download and extract the .7z file on your desktop
-open the folder \"The Rebirth of Konahrik\"
-drag the \"textures\" folder into your \"skyrim\\data\" folder[/color]

[b]ALH[/b]

[line]

If needed, someone made a mod to remove the hood:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16669]Hoodless Dragon Priest Masks by insaneguy99[/url]

[line]

[u]My other mods:[/u]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4679]Staff of Magnus Improved[/url]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4947]Sweet Mother - the Night Mother Improvement[/url]
author: ALH
